lines.text: This house is no place for a shameless hussy who brings home any man who comes along!
All that will take a lot of money. Do you have it?

[singing]
This passion I feel is stronger than chains, for it torments my soul until I can't go on.
I do. I could afford a first-class funeral for my dreams. Seeing you again brought them all back. You were in my most beautiful dream, you know.
happy, carefree, laughing. I loved seeing you laugh.
My lawyer. Always the same thing. He's continuing his investigation but he has no news yet.
Get used to to it and stop tormenting yourself.
It's been five years of torment.
Poor Anna. How you must have suffered!
No. Hold me. I'm so happy.
